source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT BatchNo 
FROM [dbo].[Reports_batch]
ORDER BY 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat (
    'EXEC [dbo].[sp_ChildPipelineLog_Insert] ',
    '''', 'Started', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
    '''', convertTimeZone(utcnow(),'UTC','India Standard Time'), '''', ',',
    '''', '', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerName, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerType, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerTime, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().parameters.TenantId, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', ''''
)

value.value:
@if(and(and(and(and(
equals(variables('Get ReportPage Status'),'Succeeded'),
equals(variables('ReportPage Staging Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('ReportPages Live Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('ReportPages Batch Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('ReportPages History Status'),'Succeeded')),
'Succeeded','Failed')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT BatchNo 
FROM [dbo].[Reports_batch]
ORDER BY 1

select TenantId,AppClientId,AppTenantId,AppClientSecret,CreatedAt from [dbo].[ClientInformation] 
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROW 
ONLY;

select TenantId,AppClientId,AppTenantId,AppClientSecret,CreatedAt from [dbo].[ClientInformation] 
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROW 
ONLY;
